page.title: 18LEISURE TIME 2
page.content: One member of our class Matthew James goes to a break dancing class,which is an acrobatic form of dancing.Elaine goes to drama and is doing the play of sleeping Beauty at the moment.In it she is a herald and one of the fairies there are rehersals every Tuesday There is a stage hand who comes along as well to jot down what we need.The practices are held at the village hall.The play is shown to parents at the end of term. Rachel goes to gymnastics and enjoys it very much.It is every Tuesday at 5.00p.m until 6.00pm.There are 3 classes called beginners, intermediate and advanced. She is in the intermediate group.They go on the beam,the vault and do floor- work.On the beam they do stag leaps, stag leaps,jumps,half turns,skipping, running,dips and walk backwardson, on the vault they do through vaults.
